allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Convert Supabase Edge Function to Vercel API endpoint

This fixes the 404 error by migrating from Supabase Edge Functions to Vercel serverless functions for deployment compatibility.

Changes:
- Created Vercel API endpoint at api/parse-pdf.js for PDF parsing
- Updated claudeParser.ts to use Vercel API endpoint instead of Supabase
- Added vercel.json configuration for API routes
- Updated .env with CLAUDE_API_KEY for server-side use
- Created .env.example with required environment variables
- Enhanced README.md with setup and deployment instructions

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add root-level configuration for Vercel monorepo deployment

This fixes the build error by providing proper configuration for Vercel
to build the 340B Location List Comparator from the monorepo structure.

Changes:
- Added root-level vercel.json with build commands for subdirectory
- Copied API endpoint to root-level api/ directory for Vercel functions
- Configured proper build output directory

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
